characterDescription: Dandos the Oilsworn was an artist who died 300 years ago. Shallan claims that she learned how to draw from a book he had written that was part of her father's collection.

characterDetails.Notes: Dandos the Oilsworn is named for the cosmere books contributing visual artist Dan dos Santos. He did the American cover of Warbreaker and several of the interior arts (i.e., the fashion pages) in Oathbringer. He's one of Brandon's favorite artists.
